## 理论课教学安排（48学时）


```{r, echo=FALSE, message=FALSE, warning=FALSE}
# devtools::install_github("rstudio/fontawesome")
pkg <- c("tidyverse","kableExtra", "bookdown", "blogdown", "fontawesome")

load.pkg <- lapply(pkg, require, character.only = TRUE)

list_chpt <- c("第01章(绪论)",
  "第02章(一元回归：基本思想)",
  "第03章(一元回归：估计问题)",
  "第04章(一元回归：假设检验)",
  "第05章(一元回归：模型形式)",
  "第06章(多元回归1：代数部分)",
  "第06章(多元回归2：矩阵部分)",
  "第07章(放宽基本假设：多重共线性)",
    "第08章(放宽基本假设：异方差性)",
  "第09章(放宽基本假设：自相关性)",
  "第10章 虚拟变量回归模型",
  "第11章 内生解释变量问题")

# get the slide files
list_slide <- list.files("../../static/course-econometrics/", pattern = "^[0-9].*\\.html$")

# get slide dir
url_slide <- stringr::str_c("/course-econometrics/", list_slide, sep = "")

# combine with icons
addLink <- function(link, icon) {
  paste0("<a href=\"", link, "\">", as.character(fa(icon)), "</a>")
}

# "file-pdf"
names_chn <- c("章节内容", "阅读材料", "在线课件", "pdf课件", "实验上机","随堂作业")

syllabus <- data.frame(chapter = list_chpt,
           #section = list_sec,
           slide = addLink(link = url_slide, icon = "file-powerpoint")) %>%
  mutate(pdf= addLink(link = "", icon = "file-pdf"),
         reading = addLink(link = "", icon = "newspaper"),
         lab = addLink(link = "", icon = "laptop-code"),
         exercise = addLink(link = "", icon = "edit")) %>%
  select(chapter, reading, slide, pdf, lab, exercise) %>%
  rename_at(vars(names(.)), ~names_chn)

knitr::kable(syllabus, align = "l",escape = F) %>%
  kableExtra::kable_styling(full_width = T)
```
